member.name: T:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitterExtensions
member.summary: 事件发射器扩展类

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitterExtensions.RemoveListener``1(``0,System.String,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Removes the specified listener from the listener array for the event named eventName. will remove, at most, one instance of a listener from the listener array. If any single listener has been added multiple times to the listener array for the specified eventName, then must be called multiple times to remove each instance.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitterExtensions.On``1(``0,System.String,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Adds the listener function to the end of the listeners array for the event named eventName. No checks are made to see if the listener has already been added. Multiple calls passing the same combination of eventName and listener will result in the listener being added, and called, multiple times. Helper method for .
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitterExtensions.Once``1(``0,System.String,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Adds a one-time listener function for the event named eventName. The next time eventName is triggered, this listener is removed and then invoked. Helper method for .
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: T:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1
member.summary: event emitter

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1.NewListenerSymbol
member.summary: The EventEmitter instance will emit its own event before a listener is added to its internal array of listeners.

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1.RemoveListenerSymbol
member.summary: The event is emitted after the listener is removed.

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1.ErrorMonitorSymbol
member.summary: This symbol shall be used to install a listener for only monitoring 'error' events. Listeners installed using this symbol are called before the regular 'error' listeners are called. Installing a listener using this symbol does not change the behavior once an 'error' event is emitted, therefore the process will still crash if no regular 'error' listener is installed.

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1.DefaultMaxListeners
member.summary: By default, a maximum of 10 listeners can be registered for any single event. This limit can be changed for individual EventEmitter instances using the emitter.setMaxListeners(n) method. To change the default for all EventEmitter instances, the EventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners property can be used. If this value is not a positive number, a TypeError will be thrown.

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.EventEmitter`1.ToImplement
member.summary: return this.

member.name: T:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1
member.summary: event emitter

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.AddListener(System.String,System.Action{System.Object[]})
member.summary: Alias for Adds the listener function to the end of the listeners array for the event named eventName. No checks are made to see if the listener has already been added. Multiple calls passing the same combination of eventName and listener will result in the listener being added, and called, multiple times.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.Emit(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Synchronously calls each of the listeners registered for the event named eventName, in the order they were registered, passing the supplied arguments to each.
member.returns: Returns true if the event had listeners, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.EventNames
member.summary: Returns an array listing the events for which the emitter has registered listeners. The values in the array will be strings

member.name: P:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.MaxListeners
member.summary: The current max listener value for the EventEmitter or defaults to .

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.ListenerCount(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the number of listeners listening to the event named eventName.
member.param: The name of the event being listened for
member.returns: Returns the number of listeners listening to the event named eventName.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.Listeners(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the array of listeners for the event named eventName.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.Off(System.String,System.Action{System.Object[]})
member.summary: Alias for . Removes the specified listener from the listener array for the event named eventName. will remove, at most, one instance of a listener from the listener array. If any single listener has been added multiple times to the listener array for the specified eventName, then must be called multiple times to remove each instance.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.summary: Adds the listener function to the end of the listeners array for the event named eventName. No checks are made to see if the listener has already been added. Multiple calls passing the same combination of eventName and listener will result in the listener being added, and called, multiple times.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.PrependListener(System.String,System.Action{System.Object[]})
member.summary: Adds the listener function to the beginning of the listeners array for the event named eventName. No checks are made to see if the listener has already been added. Multiple calls passing the same combination of eventName and listener will result in the listener being added, and called, multiple times.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.PrependOnceListener(System.String,System.Action{System.Object[]})
member.summary: Adds a one-time listener function for the event named eventName to the beginning of the listeners array. The next time eventName is triggered, this listener is removed, and then invoked.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.RemoveAllListener(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all listeners, or those of the specified eventName.
member.returns: Returns a reference to the EventEmitter, so that calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.EventEmitter.IEventEmitter`1.RawListeners(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the array of listeners for the event named eventName, including any wrappers (such as those created by ).
